name: Breakoban
description:
Push boxes, open doors, solve puzzles, and beware of the unstable floors!

See if you can complete all 10 levels!

Progress is automatically saved, so you can come back later if you get stuck :D

Controls

WASD / Arrows - Move
R / Space - Restart
Escape - Quit

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 49

Special thanks to Astrobit for help with ideas and playtesting :)
